episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses are a Cult: The BITE Model
episodes.description: Tackling Jehovah's Witnesses vs the Bite Model #jehovahswitnesses #exjw #bible #jehovahswitness #newworldtranslation #jworg #jw #watchtower

episodes.title: Why Do I Make Videos About Jehovah's Witnesses?
episodes.description:
I've made several videos exposing Jehovah's Witnesses and their policies, and comments from various platforms have questioned my motives. I don't need to explain anything, but I think it's appropriate to give a response as it gives me an opportunity to highlight inconsistency within Watchtower policy, culture, and what they tell outsiders.

#exjw #jehovahswitnesses #bible #jehovahswitness #newworldtranslation #watchtower #jworg

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses, Separation & Divorce, and The Penalties for Adherents
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses have a complicated view of Divorce and Separation, and their rules make breaking marriage arrangements extremely difficult and impossible to navigate without being hurt by the Organization

#exjw #jehovahswitnesses #jehovahswitness #divorce #separation #bible #newworldtranslation

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses and Blood Transfusions: a 2000 Adjustment That Changed Everything (And Nothing)
episodes.description:
A 1998 dispute between Watchtower and Bulgaria lead to an adjustment in the penalty for Jehovah's Witnesses who take a Blood Transfusion. This penalty was framed as a doctrinal adjustment, but in actuality changes almost nothing except some terminology.

#exjw #jehovahswitnesses #bible #jehovahswitness #newworldtranslation

episodes.title: The Anointed and the Great Crowd: Issues That Arise From a Broken Doctrine
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses believe in two classes of afterlife, but this belief means that scripture can be interpreted to exclude one class but include the other. Jehovah's Witnesses will never recognize this. 

#exjw #jehovahswitnesses #jehovahswitness #bible #newworldtranslation
